nodes.text: This stormtrooper was a member of the Stormtrooper Corps that was stationed on the Outer Rim world of Lothal four years before the Battle of Yavin. He and several other troopers were escorting 264, a courier droid, to the Sentinel-class landing craft Lagos when the squad was attacked by Sabine Wren. Her fellow Spectre Garazeb Orrelios came up behind them and bashed him and another trooper's heads together.
